...understandable, digestible format. It's a hard field to work in and can sometimes feel overwhelming or frustrating to constantly fight against fear mongering, but wow, the work you do is so important.

An example of a good article I found!

...instead of "fake news" or clickbait. There are a lot of scary, seemingly-legit articles out there; I can't blame my cousin for being worried.

So this is a big THANK YOU to science communicators that are working hard to get trustworthy, factual evidence out there in an... 2/3
